Based on the search results, I found comprehensive information about TikTok hashtag statistics and viral trends for 2024. However, I didn't find any specific information about a "Dune TikTok hashtag" with 2.4 billion views. Let me provide you with the key findings from the search:

## TikTok Hashtag Statistics and Viral Trends 2024

### Top Performing Hashtags by Views

As of January 2024, the hashtag "#fyp," which stands for "for you page," was the most used hashtag on TikTok, amassing almost 55.4 trillion views across posts using it. The hashtag "for you" ranked second, with approximately 31.7 trillion lifetime views on TikTok short-video posts using the hashtag.(no content)The #fyp (For You Page) remains the most viewed hashtag on TikTok, amassing over 45 trillion views globally.

### Content Categories and Performance

The most popular category on the video-sharing app TikTok is entertainment. It has accumulated 535 billion hashtag views collectively. The next popular categories are dance (181 billion), pranks (79 billion), fitness/sport (57 billion), DIY (39 billion), and beauty (33 billion).

### Hashtag Challenge Impact

Hashtag challenges on TikTok can generate billions of views, with some reaching up to 1 billion within days.(no content)Branded hashtag challenges increase engagement by 40%.

### Platform Statistics for 2024

TikTok reaches over 1 billion monthly active users. TikTok's massive user base of over 1 billion people each month places it among the largest social platforms globally, connecting audiences of all ages and demographics.(no content)As of 2024, TikTok has the highest engagement rate (2.65%), followed by Instagram (0.7%), Facebook (0.15%), and Twitter (0.05%).

### Revenue and Growth

In 2024, TikTok currently generated a revenue of USD 18.5 billion, double the amount of last year (USD 9.89 billion).

### Notable Records

The hashtag has generated 1 billion views, proving just how popular these videos are. (referring to the #jellycat hashtag)

Bella Poarch shared the most liked TikTok video, lip syncing to M to the B by Millie B, with over 69.6 million likes, reflecting the extraordinary viral potential of the platform.

**Note**: The search did not return any specific information about a "Dune" hashtag reaching 2.4 billion views. If you're looking for information about a specific Dune-related hashtag or campaign, you may want to search for more specific terms or check TikTok directly for the most current hashtag performance data.
